item.title: Every Super Mario Platform Game Ranked from Worst to Best
item.description: Super Mario? Oh, yeah! The mustachioed plumber who’s become more iconic than sliced bread.

item.title: Every The King of Fighters KOF Game Ranked from Worst to Best
item.description: Welcome to the ultimate showdown, where fists, fury, and fantastic fighting come together in an electrifying ranking of “The King of Fighters” (KOF) games.

item.title: Our List of Every Metal Slug Game Ranked from Worst to Best
item.description: Ah, Metal Slug—a name that conjures up nostalgic images of chaotic battles, quirky humor, and explosive action.

item.title: Top 22 Upcoming Switch Games of 2024 We Can't Wait to Play
item.description: Welcome to our electrifying rundown of the “Top 22 Upcoming Switch Games of 2024 We Can’t Wait to Play.

item.title: 28 Must-Play Platformer Games on Nintendo Switch (Our Ranking)
item.description: Welcome to the ultimate guide to platforming paradise on the Nintendo Switch!

item.title: Top 21 Must-Own RPGs on Nintendo Switch Ranked
item.description: Hey there, fellow gamers and Switch enthusiasts! Are you ready to dive into a world of epic quests, unforgettable characters, and hours of gameplay that’ll have you glued to your console?

item.title: Top 20 Open World Games on Nintendo Switch Ranked (Our Picks)
item.description: Buckle up, because we’re about to dive into the vast and exciting world of open-world games available on this fantastic console.

item.title: The Ultimate Top 10 FPS Games on the Nintendo Switch
item.description: We’ve compiled a list of the top 10 FPS games that will turn your Switch into an epic battleground.

item.title: 25 Must-Play Racing Games for Your Nintendo Switch
item.description: Are you ready to dive into the world of high-speed thrills on your Nintendo Switch?

item.title: Top 20 Most Anticipated Games of 2024 Ranked (Our Picks)
item.description: Ready to dive into what 2024 has in store for us?

item.title: The Best Nintendo Switch Beat 'Em Ups (Our Top Picks)
item.description: Are you a proud owner of a Nintendo Switch? And you’ve got a hankering for some good old beat ’em up action?

item.title: Top 20 Retro Co-Op Beat 'Em Ups for Nostalgic Gamers
item.description: If you’ve ever gathered around an arcade machine or a console with your buddies, ready to lay the smackdown on hordes of bad guys, you know the pure joy of co-op beat ’em up games.
